education.name: BrainStation
education.title: Diploma in Software Engineering
description: Through the course, I developed proficiency in a diverse tech stack, including HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript, React, Axios, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, Knex, Jira, and Git.
Achieved 2nd place in LoyaltyOne's Air Miles hackathon.
Collaborated on a group project utilizing Agile workflows, leveraging Jira for task management and Gitflow for version control to ensure efficient and organized development processes.

education.name: codecademy
education.title: Certificate in Front End Web Development
description: Developed a strong foundation in front-end web development, learning key technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Gained hands-on experience in implementing responsive design principles to create user-friendly interfaces across various devices.
Completed real-world projects to solidify knowledge of DOM manipulation, APIs, and asynchronous JavaScript.
